channel.title: Charlie Ergen on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Charlie Ergen on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: EchoStar Strikes $23 Billion Deal to Sell Spectrum Licenses to AT&T
item.description: Part of the firm’s efforts to resolve FCC inquiries and boost its balance sheet, it “puts our business on a solid financial path,” says CEO and president Hamid Akhavan.
